## Data load & libary load

```{r, echo = FALSE}
require(reshape2)
require(gplots)
require(preprocessCore)


d_c <- read.csv("160715/chin.csv", header = TRUE)
d_d <- read.csv("160715/dorsal.csv", header = TRUE)
d_v <- read.csv("160715/ventral.csv", header = TRUE)
```

## data process
```{r, echo=FALSE}
#RNAseq.R function, matrix conversion, log10, normalize quantile.
d_c_m <- RNAseq(d_c)
d_d_m <- RNAseq(d_d)
d_v_m <- RNAseq(d_v)
```

## clustering for heatmap
```{r, echo=FALSE}
# correlation clustering
cor_t <-cor(t(d.m.log.nq))
cor_t.dist <-dist(d.m.log.nq)
cor_hclu_avg <-hclust(cor_t.dist, method = "average")
cor_hclu_com <-hclust(cor_t.dist, method = "complete")
cor_hclu_ward <-hclust(cor_t.dist, method = "ward.D2")



```
